RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory goal preference (digestion)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes digesting prey or converting them into other materials. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to digest prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive fondeur
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As an obsessive fondeu(r/se), [PAWN_label] loves digestion and all manner of conversion into bodily fluids, to the neglect of other goals.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Fondeur
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As a fondeu(r/se), [PAWN_label] likes the feeling of prey digesting into mush, or milk, or spunk, or what-have-you: to feel the struggle cease, and the hard lumps go soft.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Digestion ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about digesting prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Digestion aversion
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes digesting prey. [PAWN_pronoun] takes no enjoyment out of gurgling a life away and would rather [PAWN_possessive] prey left intact.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Digestion disgust
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates digesting prey. What an act of unimaginable cruelty!

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory goal preference (pleasure)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes consuming prey for mutual pleasure. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to pleasure prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive plaire
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves to pleasure-vore prey. [PAWN_pronoun] seeks little else besides the usage of [PAWN_possessive] body as an engine of pleasure.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Plaire
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes to pleasure-vore prey, with a sensual tour of [PAWN_possessive] body.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Pleasure ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about pleasuring prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Chaste predator
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes pleasuring prey. Maybe [PAWN_pronoun]'s squeamish about letting prey get lewd inside [PAWN_objective]; maybe [PAWN_pronoun] just doesn't enjoy it like prey do.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Celibate predator
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates pleasuring prey. Vore is not to be treated as a fancy sex position.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory goal preference (storage)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes indefinitely storing live prey. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to store prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Geolier hoarder
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As a geolier(e), [PAWN_label] loves to hold onto prey for as long as possible, and would be delighted to store as many people as can be fit inside of [PAWN_objective] forever.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Geolier
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As a geolier(e), [PAWN_label] likes to hold onto prey for as long as possible. [PAWN_pronoun] would make a good jail cell.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Storage ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about storing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Noncommittal pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes storing prey indefinitely. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't want to be burdened by prey longer than [PAWN_pronoun] has to. Find someone else to be your warehouse.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: In-and-out pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates storing prey indefinitely. Find someone else to be your warehouse.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory goal preference (Hold)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes temporarily storing live prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Heavy Holder
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As a heavy Holder, [PAWN_label] loves to allow [PAWN_possessive] prey a trip through [PAWN_objective]self.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Holder
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As a Holder, [PAWN_label] likes to pass their prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Hold ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about temporarily storing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: UnHoldy pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes temporarily storing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Holding refusal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates storing prey temporarily.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory goal preference (heal)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes healing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Heal Slut
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: No need to spam E, [PAWN_label] has got you covered with a cozy place to stay in and get healthy.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Healer
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As a professional MMO Healer, [PAWN_label] likes to carry their team.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Heal ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about healing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Unhealthy pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes healing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Healing refusal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates healing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish goal preference (digestion)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn wants to be digested (or converted into some other material). At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to be digested. Be careful increasing the commonality of a digestion preference: willing pawns can easily be killed by predators with little notice.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Digestion-wish
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As an obsessive aliment(e), [PAWN_label] just can't help it; [PAWN_pronoun] wants to be utterly digested.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Aliment
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As an aliment(e), [PAWN_label] often thinks about getting digested someday.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Alimentary ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being digested.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Alimentary aversion
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is not particularly interested in an early, acidic grave.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Life-wish
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Are you mad? Who would want to be digested alive? [PAWN_label] certainly doesn't.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish goal preference (pleasure)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn wants to be used by a predator for pleasure. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to be pleasured.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive Godemichet
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As an obsessive godemichet(te), [PAWN_label] lives to be used for pleasure, and seeks it in the bellies of predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Godemichet
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: As a godemichet(te), [PAWN_label] likes to get off deep inside someone just as much as shallowly.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Dildo ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being used for a predator's pleasure.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Chaste prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes climbing into a predator for pleasure's sake. Maybe [PAWN_pronoun]'s some sort of weirdo who doesn't find innards arousing?

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Celibate prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates trying to find pleasure in the insides of a predator. [PAWN_pronoun] just can't get it on in there.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish goal preference (storage)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn wants to be stored indefinitely inside a predator. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to be stored. Be careful increasing the commonality of a storage preference: willing pawns can easily be lost indefinitely among however many predators you have who are capable of storage.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Shut-in prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] would rather live the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life inside someone's belly than contribute to society in any way.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Live-in prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Sometimes, [PAWN_label] just wants to take a vacation inside of someone. Or move in.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Live-in ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being stored indefinitely.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Busy prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: If you have to eat [PAWN_label], at least don't make it an extended stay. [PAWN_pronoun] has [PAWN_possessive] own things to do.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: In-and-out prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] cannot think of a life more boring than squishing around inside of a predator for days, months, or heaven forbid, years.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish goal preference (Hold)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn wants to be temporarily stored inside a predator. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to be temp-stored.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: In-and-out prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves passing through and taking in the sights of [PAWN_possessive] predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Live-in prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Sometimes, [PAWN_label] just wants to take a vacation inside of someone. Or move in.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Hold ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being held temporarily.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Busy prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: If you have to eat [PAWN_label], at least don't make it an extended stay. [PAWN_pronoun] has [PAWN_possessive] own things to do.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Unwilling
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] cannot think of a life more boring than squishing around inside of a predator for days, months, or heaven forbid, years.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish goal preference (heal)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn wants to be healed inside a predator. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to be heal-vored.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Hypochondriac
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] always feels like they need to slip into someone to be healed, even when [PAWN_possessive] is perfectly fine.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Cozy prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] prefers healing vore over an expensive trip to a spa.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Heal ambivalence
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being vored for health.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Uncomfortable prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] would prefer not being vored this way, even if it would be beneficial for their health.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Trypanophobia
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] would rather succumb to their injuries than allow [PAWN_objective]self to be used as a healing prey.
